StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateCandidateAsvabFromPac]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAId uniqueiden..er, @OldRecVersion varchar(3), @OldRecAsvabDate date.me, @Version varchar(3), @AsvabDate date.me, @GSSubTest varchar(2), @ARSubTest varchar(2), @WKSubTest varchar(2), @PCSubTest varchar(2), @NOSubTest varchar(2), @CSSubTest varchar(2), @ASSubTest varchar(2), @MKSubTest varchar(2), @MCSubTest varchar(2), @EISubTest varchar(2), @VESubTest varchar(2), @AFQTScore int, @GTScore int, @ELScore int, @CLScore int, @MMScore int, @MepsOrganiza.onID int, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS BEGIN
-- STEP 1: Start the transac.on BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @PersonID int; DECLARE @ExamID uniqueiden..er;
SELECT @PersonID = MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID FROM dbo.NWA WHERE rowguid = @NWAId
SELECT TOP 1 @ExamID = rowguid FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_ASVAB WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND VERSION = @OldRecVersion AND YEAR(ASVAB_DATE) = YEAR(@OldRecAsvabDate) AND MONTH(ASVAB_DATE) = MONTH(@OldRecAsvabDate) AND DAY(ASVAB_DATE) = DAY(@OldRecAsvabDate) AND DATEPART(hour,ASVAB_DATE) = DATEPART(hour,@OldRecAsvabDate) AND DATEPART(minute,ASVAB_DATE) = DATEPART(minute,@OldRecAsvabDate) AND DATEPART(second,ASVAB_DATE) = DATEPART(second,@OldRecAsvabDate)
-- STEP 2 & 3: Issue the data change statement(s), checking @@ERROR a.er each statement IF @ExamID IS NOT NULL BEGIN -- if already exists. UPDATE. UPDATE [dbo].[CANDIDATE_ASVAB] SET [VERSION] = @VERSION ,[ASVAB_DATE] = @AsvabDate ,[GS_SUBTEST] = @GSSubTest ,[AR_SUBTEST] = @ARSubTest ,[WK_SUBTEST] = @WKSubTest ,[PC_SUBTEST] = @PCSubTest ,[NO_SUBTEST] = @NOSubTest ,[CS_SUBTEST] = @CSSubTest ,[AS_SUBTEST] = @ASSubTest ,[MK_SUBTEST] = @MKSubTest ,[MC_SUBTEST] = @MCSubTest ,[EI_SUBTEST] = @EISubTest ,[VE_SUBTEST] = @VESubTest ,[AFQT_SCORE] = @AFQTScore ,[GT_SCORE] = @GTScore ,[EL_SCORE] = @ELScore ,[CL_SCORE] = @CLScore ,[MM_SCORE] = @MMScore ,[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] = @MepsOrganiza.onID ,[USER_LOGIN] = @UserLogin ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate()
WHERE rowguid = @ExamID
END ELSE BEGIN -- if does not exist. INSERT. INSERT INTO [dbo].[CANDIDATE_ASVAB] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[VERSION] ,[ASVAB_DATE] ,[GS_SUBTEST] ,[AR_SUBTEST] ,[WK_SUBTEST] ,[PC_SUBTEST] ,[NO_SUBTEST] ,[CS_SUBTEST] ,[AS_SUBTEST] ,[MK_SUBTEST] ,[MC_SUBTEST] ,[EI_SUBTEST] ,[VE_SUBTEST] ,[AFQT_SCORE] ,[GT_SCORE] ,[EL_SCORE] ,[CL_SCORE] ,[MM_SCORE] ,[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@PersonID ,@Version ,@AsvabDate ,@GSSubTest ,@ARSubTest ,@WKSubTest ,@PCSubTest ,@NOSubTest ,@CSSubTest ,@ASSubTest ,@MKSubTest ,@MCSubTest ,@EISubTest ,@VESubTest ,@AFQTScore ,@GTScore ,@ELScore ,@CLScore ,@MMScore ,@MepsOrganiza.onID ,@UserLogin ,GetDate()) END
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- STEP 4: If we reach this point, the commands completed successfully -- Commit the transac.on.... COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
